Title: Authorizes the attorney general to bring an action for violation of the prohibitions concerning unlawful selling practices and specifies damages awardable
Summary: Authorizes the attorney general to bring an action for violation of the prohibitions concerning unlawful selling practices and specifies damages awardable.
LawCode: Amd ยง396, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to authorizing the attorney general to bring an action for violation of the prohibitions concerning unlawful selling practices and specifying damages awardable
